name: Text: Advanced (12-line)
description: Original Card Factory text schedule format

name: Compact Single-Line
description: One-line-per-game CSV, pipe, or tab-separated format

name: AYSO Region 88 Weekly Schedule
description: AYSO age/div, home, away, date/time formats

name: AYSO Region 88 Playoffs
description: Tab-separated playoff schedule with referee assignments

name: Glendale / AYSO Table Format
description: Columnar multi-block schedule (Game#, Div, Round, Home, Away, Date, Time...)

name: Arbiter: CSV Schedule
description: Paste Arbiter's Plain Text File Format

name: User Defined Mapper (TSV/CSV)
description: User-defined mapping from columns to standardized game fields.
